title: Interpretation of seeing a wound on the face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a wound on the face in a dream, a wound on the face can be the result of an accident or a beating that sometimes leads to wounds on the face that can lead to scars or affect it for the rest of life. Warning of the appearance of evil, and interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of a wound in the leg, whether single, married, pregnant or divorced, with its various meanings. Through the vision site, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a wound in the leg in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of senior interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a wound in the face in a dream Seeing a wound on the face indicates an injury to the viewer. Seeing a small scratch on the face It symbolizes talking about the absent with those close to him, that is, the priest who gossips among people. Healing wounds in a dream It indicates a disaster that almost happened to the visionary, but he survived. Interpretation of seeing a wound in the back in a dream Seeing a wound on his back in a dream It indicates that there are many problems and disputes that have occurred and are still affecting the soul. Seeing the wound bleeding profusely It indicates the presence of a deceitful and cunning person. Interpretation of seeing a wound in a single dream A woman seeing alone that she was injured in a dream It symbolizes being exposed to a major crisis and distress. Seeing an injured person in a dream indicates the instability of the individual's psychological state. Seeing a wound healing in a single dream It indicates the collapse of her worries and all her bad luck. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman's wound Seeing a wound in a married woman's dream indicates that bad news comes from a woman Bad. Seeing a married woman recovering from a wound in a dream indicates the end of her problems and peace prevails over her crises. Interpretation of seeing a wound in a dream for a man Seeing a wound in a man's dream on her palm is a waste of money. Seeing an injured person in a dream indicates that he is in distress and a great financial loss. Interpretation of seeing a wound in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a wound in a pregnant woman's dream indicates a great benefit for her and a lot of money. Seeing a wound for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that there are women near her who interfere in her life affairs. Interpretation of a dream of a wound in a dream for a young man Seeing a wound in the young man's stomach indicates that he obtained a lot of money legally. Seeing a wound on the young man's back indicates a feeling of disappointment and loss of hope. Interpretation of seeing a wound on the cheek in a dream Seeing a wound on the cheek without blood in a dream shows that the dreamer gets something he wants badly. Seeing a wound on the cheek with blood in a dream indicates that the dreamer is experiencing distress. We are pleased to see your dream host site about "Interpretation of seeing a wound on the face" through the comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing a gift in a dream

preview.html: A gift in a dream: The vision of a gift is considered one of the praiseworthy visions that has won the approval of jurists. In its interpretation, this vision is linked to many issues that have an impact on the context. Gold or base metals, and in this article we consider in more detail all the signs and cases of presenting a gift. What does a gift mean in a dream? A gift in a dream symbolizes affection, intimacy, happy news, opportunities, joys, harmony, vows that a person fulfills, satisfaction of needs, achievement of goals and objectives, and getting out of adversity And conflict. The symbol of a gift in a dream is also a sign of love, courtship, close marriage, an alliance of hearts, spreading kindness, nourishment, divine gifts and gifts, ending existing differences, and avoiding conflicts and temptations. Whoever sees a gift, this indicates reconciliation between opponents. If the gift is within the family, it indicates a relationship. Kinship, the return of water to its normal flow, and salvation from severe adversity. If the dreamer sees someone giving him a gift and knows him or has a relationship with him, this means blessings, payments, fruitful projects, successful partnerships, changing circumstances for the better, and the exchange of benefits and goals. A gift in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin believes that a gift indicates love, friendliness, and closeness, as the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “Travel and love one another,” as it indicates kindness, blessing, like-mindedness, and success in work, with good luck, peace, and good news. And whoever sees the gift, loves or finds what He wants it, as it symbolizes achieving goals, fulfilling goals, satisfying needs, fulfilling commandments, paying what is due, removing obstacles and worries, removing despair from the heart, renewing hopes, and reaping absent wishes. Also, seeing a gift indicates happiness, bliss, courtship, and marriage in the future. The near future, due to the words of God Almighty: “You rejoice in your gift” and “I am sending them his guidance.” A gift in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen goes on to say that the gift symbolizes familiarity, friendliness, reconciliation, kindness, the end of disputes, the initiative of goodness and reconciliation between people, the removal of confusion, and the clarification of misunderstandings. Clarifying events and removing worries. And sorrows. And whoever sees the gift and gets married, this indicates that his wife will become pregnant in the coming days if he is eligible for it. If the gift is of silver, then it indicates the performance of worship and happiness in meeting God, good news, guidance, natural instinct, and staying away from laziness and temptation. A gift in a dream for Al-Nabulsi, Al-Nabulsi says in his interpretation of seeing the gift It is a symbol of alliance and solidarity in times of crisis, doing good and benefiting others, returning things to their normal course, steadfastness of opinion, and sincerity of speech. And work and blessing in livelihood and earning degrees and offices. And whoever sees the gift in his hand, this indicates his satisfaction, ending a dispute that has existed for a long time, participating in projects after a feasibility study, and starting a partnership from which the person aims to live a lawful life and enter into new experiences that will benefit morally, psychologically and materially. The gift was a book

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a legal talisman in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the legal talisman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained many interpretations of seeing the legal ruqyah in a dream. Also, the legal ruqyah on the dreamer’s fortune teller indicates many different meanings, and the ruqyah protects the soul from envy and evil, while the ruqyah on the dreamer’s fortune teller differs from person to person. To another. Personally, depending on the details contained in the dream, and here are the most important interpretations about the interpretation of the dream of seeing the legal talisman in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the ruqyah in a dream for a single woman. The interpretations that fall under each dream vary and differ from one person to another, while seeing the legal ruqyah in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve his goals. And his aspirations. Also, ruqyah in a dream for a single woman is an explanation of the blessing in her life. Age and freedom from all magic or envy. The following are its most important interpretations. Interpretation of ruqyah in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that an old man performs ruqyah for her, this indicates success in the life of the general fortune teller. Also, seeing her family being promoted for an unmarried woman indicates the presence of A good and happy relationship between family members. While seeing the talisman in a single woman’s dream shows that she is a strong and hardworking person and strives to achieve her dreams. Likewise, seeing the ruqyah in a dream means comfort and relief from worries. See also: A detailed interpretation of selling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Crying when hearing the ruqyah In a dream, seeing a ruqyah in a dream means comfort from God Almighty for the person who has the vision if he suffers from envy or the like. Also, hearing the ruqyah in a dream varies according to the social status of the viewer, while hearing the ruqyah in a dream indicates many different interpretations and connotations, and here are the most important interpretations of crying when hearing the ruqyah in a dream: Ibn Sirin narrated that crying over the ruqyah in a dream indicates comfort and gentleness for the pioneer. Also, Seeing the dreamer crying when hearing the Qur’an indicates the purity and happiness of the dreamer’s heart. While seeing the dreamer crying in a dream shows the fear and fear of God. See also: Turtles in a dream and the interpretation of seeing turtles in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of seeing a legal spell in a dream for a married womanIf the dreamer sees in a dream someone promoting him And he changes verses from the Qur’an to him, this means that the dreamer has been freed from envy, while he sees a person being promoted to another person in a married dream, due to his closeness to him. The woman belongs to her Lord, and it is one of the dreams in which the dreamer is interested in knowing her, and here are the most important interpretations that have occurred, the interpretation of seeing someone performing the ruqyah on me in a dream for a married woman: The legal ruqyah in a dream for a married woman indicates married life without obstacles and problems. Also, seeing the legal rukiya in The dream indicates psychological comfort and tranquility. While seeing a legal Rukia means getting rid of heresies and magic. See also: A detailed interpretation of a girl seeing a pregnant woman in a dream. Seeing the noble sheikh in a married woman’s dream. If the dreamer sees in a dream a sophisticated person, this indicates the presence of envy or magic for the dreamer and the dreamer should Elevate it to reality, and see reality in the dream appear

title: Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream has been seen by many dream interpretation scholars. A scorpion is not a good dream, because it is in fact one of the insects that causes a lot of fear and anxiety when it appears. Seeing a scorpion in a dream varies according to the dreamer, whether he is a man or single. Girl, married woman or pregnant woman. We will try to identify some clues about the different sightings of a scorpion in a dream. Such as seeing an escape from a scorpion, to emphasize the importance of not deriving the visions and interpretations that we will mention, because the interpretation of dreams must sit before a world who knows many personal matters and can interpret them correctly. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream according to Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi says that the scorpion in a dream has many connotations, But in general, a scorpion in a dream indicates problems that the dreamer will suffer from, God forbid. As for seeing a scorpion in a dream, it is one of the dreams that have good meanings, as it indicates that great goodness will come back in the coming period. Ibn Sirin also says that seeing a scorpion collide In a dream by the dreamer, it is one of the dreams that indicates the presence of many enemies around the dreamer. Seeing a scorpion in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a scorpion in a dream indicates that there is a character in her life in the girl who causes conspiracies, and God knows best. Also, the girl is not A married woman who sees a scorpion under her clothes in a dream indicates that this girl will make some wrong decisions, and God knows best. Seeing a scorpion in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a scorpion in a dream is a bad sign. It may be a sign of some problems between the wife and husband, and God knows best. Just like a woman. A married woman who sees a black scorpion in a dream indicates that there are some bad events that have occurred in that woman’s life, such as financial losses. Seeing a scorpion in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees a scorpion in a dream indicates some good things, but as for a black scorpion in a woman’s dream Pregnant women have a bad connotation, as the black scorpion indicates the presence of some violations in the woman’s life that she commits. For them, and God knows best. Seeing a scorpion in a dream for a man. A man who sees a black scorpion in a dream indicates that this person suffers from anxiety and sadness, and God knows best. Just like a man who sees in a dream that he is hitting a scorpion, this - God willing - indicates that he will be able to defeat Enemies. In addition to killing a scorpion in a man’s dream, this indicates that the man will be able to get rid of his fears and problems. As for the scorpion sting in a man’s dream, this is one of the good dreams that indicate the good that this person will achieve. Seeing a black scorpion in a dreamBlack scorpion in a dream The unmarried person indicates the difficulties and crises that this girl faces, but she will be able to get rid of them - God willing. The black scorpion in the unmarried girl’s dream indicates that there is an evil character in this girl’s life who is trying to harm her, and God knows best.

title: What if I dreamed that I was about to give birth to Shirin’s son?

preview.html: I dreamed that I was about to give birth. This vision is one of the visions that surprises the viewer, so he resorts to knowing its interpretation. It is worth noting that this dream carries many interpretations, some of which are good and some of which are bad, and this is due to society. And the psychological state in the dream, in addition to the type of the fetus. I dreamed that I was about to give birth to Shirin’s son. I dreamed that I was about to give birth. Whoever dreams that he is pregnant and his due date is approaching, this means that he will obtain many good things, allowances, and abundant money, in addition to being promoted at work and obtaining high positions. And the dreamer will be free from everyone. His sorrows and worries that control him. If the dreamer sees that he is about to give birth in a dream, this means that he will pay off his debts, develop his circumstances for the better, and overcome the difficulties in his life. The interpretation of a divorced woman seeing her pregnancy and the approaching date of her birth is evidence that her problems around her will be solved and that she will return to Her husband again. Some believe that if a divorced woman dreams that she is about to give birth in a dream, this indicates that she has the ability to overcome this difficult stage that she went through in her previous life. I dreamed that I was about to give birth to Shirin’s son. If a man dreams that his wife is about to give birth She gives birth to twins, this is evidence that God will grant him many blessings and benefits and fulfill all his long-awaited desires. Whoever sees in a dream that his mother will give birth soon, this symbolizes the healing of himself and his mother from all the symptoms and diseases that he suffers from, and indicates the solution of all his problems and an end to them. Because of his worry and worry. Concerns. Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed that an unmarried woman would give birth. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is pregnant and the time of birth is approaching, this means that she will be exposed to some obstacles and misfortunes, but she will be able Of overcoming it soon. The closest date for a girl’s birth in a dream indicates that her worries will be removed, her anxiety will go away, and her circumstances will change for the better. It indicates that she feels anxious and stressed as her wedding date approaches. The interpretation of seeing a girl feeling tired and that her birth has come indicates that the food is very good. And an immeasurable abundance of food. If a girl sees that she will give birth to twins in a dream, this is evidence that she has committed many sins and sins in her life and she must repent and return to God (Glory be to Him) and ask for forgiveness. If the girl is pregnant in a dream but feels distressed, this is evidence However, she suffers from anxiety because of her family, and if she is happy in her life, this indicates that she will be able to achieve many successes in her professional life and earn a lot of money. I dreamed that I was giving birth to a married woman. If the married woman is not pregnant and she sees in her dream that she is pregnant and her due date is approaching, This indicates a solution to her problems and disagreements with her husband and for her to live a happy and stable life, removing the worries and burdens on her shoulders. If the dreamer is sick and sees that she is about to give birth, this indicates that she will recover and recover from all her pain soon.

title: Interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream or dreams through the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing dawn in a dream has many meanings. The dreamer, his circumstances, and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream, based on the opinion of leading interpreters such as Ibn. Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing the dawn rising in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing the dawning in a dream in general, it indicates the end of all sorrows, worries, and problems in a person’s life. Seeing a married man at dawn in a dream indicates the presence of problems between him and his wife. It leads to separation. Seeing a merchant at dawn in a dream indicates that he will achieve large profits in his trade. Seeing a prisoner at dawn in a dream indicates his release from his distress and the possibility of his release from prison soon. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dreamWhat is the interpretation Al-Nabulsi to see the dawn in a dream: Seeing the dawn in general indicates integrity, light, blessing, and reform. Seeing the dawn in a dream may indicate the end of worry and anxiety in the dreamer’s life, and prosperity and great happiness. The dreamer seeing that he committed a sin, and then dawn appeared in the dream, is his repentance to God and not going back. To sin again, and God knows best. Seeing a sick person at dawn in a dream indicates that he will recover from this disease in the coming period, and God knows best. And the dreamer saw that he saw dawn, then he got up and prayed with the worshipers in the dream, which indicates that he will travel soon, whether it is a business trip or Hajj, and God knows best. I know. Read also: The interpretation of seeing fingers in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing in a dream the dreamer praying the dawn prayer announces the achievement of his goals and desires in the coming period. Seeing the dawning in a dream indicates the relief of his distress, the end of his sadness, and the continuation of the rest of his life in good health and happiness. And God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream for a single woman: Seeing people in a dream at dawn is considered a good vision for her because it indicates good things that will happen to her in the coming days. Seeing people in a dream at dawn indicates the date of her approaching marriage to a good person. She will be in... Extreme happiness. Read also: Interpretation of seeing yourself performing prayer in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman at dawn and sunrise in a dream indicates the stability of her marital, financial, and emotional condition and the end of all bad things in her life. Seeing a married woman at dawn in a dream can That indicates the possibility of pregnancy soon, which will change her life for the better. What is the interpretation of seeing dawn in a dream for a man: Seeing a single man at dawn in a dream indicates the approaching date of his marriage to a girl he does not know. Seeing a man at dawn in a dream announces a large income that he will receive from his job. A man sees the sun appearing from his head in a dream, which indicates that he will receive a lot of goodness and nourishment in his life in the coming season, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing rows of believers in a dream. We are happy to see...

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing good words in a dream?

preview.html: His story website offers you the complete interpretation of seeing good words in a dream, and seeing kind, beautiful, and good words indicates the presence of beautiful people in our lives who love us in all its details. It is natural for a person to see in a dream a completely strange and unrealistic dream that leads to anxiety and psychological discomfort, so there is no need to worry. Interpretation of seeing good words in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that good words in a dream indicate a person’s happiness, strength, and abundance of money. Likewise Seeing kind words in a dream indicates the dreamer’s devotion to his goddess and the good deeds that he will do in his next life. Also, seeing kind words in a dream means abundance of sustenance, abundance of money, and repentance to Almighty God and returning to Him. Interpretation of seeing kind words in a completed dream for a common woman, if a girl sees In her dream, she speaks kind words and kind words, this indicates her close marriage to a good man. Also, seeing good words in a dream full of a girl’s bowl indicates the collapse of her problems and her excellence in study and life, and God knows best. Also, seeing good words indicates that the girl will enter In a new relationship and continuing in a good and blessed marriage, God willing. Seeing the kind words of an unknown man indicates the girl’s general deception and her exposure to negative thoughts and issues, and God knows best. The complete interpretation of seeing kind words in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees in her dream someone speaking to her with kind words, then this It indicates the collapse of the differences between her and her husband. You also see in her marriage that she addresses her with words that reach the heart and explain the soul, and this indicates her intense love for her husband and her obedience to his orders. Seeing kind words also indicates achieving the goals of the married woman that she seeks and communication with, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision. Kind words in the complete dream of a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that someone is speaking to her with kind words, this means that her affairs will be facilitated and the birth of her child will be easy. This vision also indicates that the date of her birth will be determined and the pain of childbirth will go away, and it indicates that she will be blessed with offspring. The good, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing good words in a dream is complete for a man. If a man sees in a dream that his wife is speaking to him in good words, this indicates food and abundance of money from the point of view of non-existence. Also, seeing good speech of a noble man indicates his marriage to a good girl. And sincere suits him, and God knows best. Also, seeing a good speech indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and problems and his transition to a new job and that he was given a lot of money, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing a public speech? If a person sees in a complete dream that he is speaking to the public, this indicates circumstances The dreamer is kind and hard-working, and God knows best. Also, seeing a full public conversation in a dream indicates a man’s marriage, advancement, high status, and great relationship. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Clues and meanings to interpret seeing the name Noah in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the Prophet Noah, peace be upon him, in a dream? An indication of blessing in the dreamer’s life. The interpretation of seeing Noah’s married wife in a dream? Sarah’s skin sign of pregnancy. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman named Noah in a dream? Details of the upcoming birth of a baby boy with his parents. What is the meaning of seeing the name of Noah Noah in a man or woman’s dream? It indicates a prolongation of the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing the killing of the Prophet in a dream? An indication of dishonesty. Interpretation of the name Noah by Ibn Sirin. Seeing Noah, peace be upon him, in a dream is a sign of blessings in the dreamer’s life and longevity. Seeing our master Noah, in a dream, shows, The closeness of a man’s relationship with a righteous woman and he will bear children. Likewise, seeing the name Noah in a dream indicates goodness, joy, and the annihilation of evil. A married woman seeing Noah in a dream is a sign of the approaching pregnancy of Sarah, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Seeing a woman named Noah in a dream Evidence that she will soon give birth to a good son with his parents. Seeing the name Noah from NabulsiSeeing Noah, peace be upon him, in a dream means deliverance from worries and pains and blessings in livelihood and children. Seeing the name Noah in a dream means longevity and escaping temptation. Likewise, the scholar of Nabulsi explains, when he saw The name Noah in a dream means that the dreamer will have a lot of gloom and blessings in the diet. Seeing the name Noah in a dream, according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, indicates the presence of harmful people in his life. Seeing Noah in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into adversity and obstacles, but He will be saved from it by God’s command. As for a married woman who sees Noah in a dream, this indicates the need to review herself and her relationship with her husband. Interpretation of the name Noah by Ibn ShaheenSeeing the name Noah in a male or female dream indicates a prolongation of the dreamer’s life, according to the interpretation of the dream interpreter Ibn Shaheen. Seeing the name Noah in a dream, according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation, indicates that there are enemies in his life who hate him and want to harm him. Also, the name Noah in a dream indicates the presence of people who are jealous of the dreamer, and God will save him from them, according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation. As for seeing our master Noah, peace be upon him, in a dream It is evidence of the blessing of the dreamer’s life and his high status. Seeing Noah, peace be upon him, indicates the necessity of gratitude and praise for the many blessings. As for seeing the killing of the Prophet in a dream, it is evidence of dishonesty. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish, shrimp in a dream, lentils in a dream, seeing raw fish, suicide in a dream, vomiting in a dream, excrement in A dream, a date in a dream, a snake in a dream, someone you love several times, interpretation of seeing dead people, ants in a dream, jeans in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about sleeping with a dead father

preview.html: Seeing a dead father in a dream and the dreamer sleeping with him is a truly frightening and disturbing vision, and we will see in this article from our site an explanation of all cases of interpretation of sleeping with a dead father. Interpretation of a dream of sleeping with a dead father in a dream for a single girl. There are many interpretations related to seeing a dream of sleeping with a father in a dream One and basically. It indicates an upcoming marriage and there are many interpretations as well, but mostly the vision means that the girl will enter a new happy life. When an unmarried girl sees herself sleeping with her deceased father, it means that the girl will get married in the coming period. When the girl saw While the unmarried woman was sleeping with her deceased father, she was happy, as she explained, for a suitable man to propose to her. Likewise, if the vision was that she saw her dead father while she was next to him, but she saw him from his back, not his face. This means that the young man who proposes to her is not suitable According to one interpretation, sleeping with a dead father means that there is a big problem for the fortuneteller. Seeing an unmarried woman sleeping with her dead father in a dream means that she is freed from her fear or some problems she is facing. Going to bed with one of the brothers , with the deceased father in a dream for a single woman. This is interpreted by the marriage of one of her relatives, and for the girl to be by her side, and show her love for her. And if the vision is for the girl to visit her deceased father. This proves that the unmarried girl misses her father very much and longs for him at all times. It indicates An unmarried girl sees that she slept with her deceased father and was very happy. This indicates that her life has become calm and stable again, and the end of the difficult period in her life. If an unmarried girl sees that she is sleeping with her deceased father and they exchange words, explain to him that there is a problem that she faces with her family, Something that you are hiding from them will be revealed. Going to a father who died while he was single, and was overcome by sadness and anxiety. This symbolizes that the girl will be exposed to a health problem and she must be careful and take care of her health. If an unmarried girl sees that she is sleeping with her deceased father and hugging him tightly. This indicates that The girl will improve her situation and rise in the ranks. She will declare her attachment to her father and miss him very much. See also: Seeing a dead father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of observing sleeping with a dead father in a dream for a married woman. Seeing sleeping with a dead father in a dream has many meanings, including good and evil, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. When he sees a married woman, he will see her dead father and sleep with him. This is explained by the fact that the wife is obedient to her husband’s orders and that there is love and tenderness between them. In the event that a married woman sees herself with her father, she sleeps with him and embraces him out of her love for him. This explains the stability of her life in the following period and the mood of pressure. If a married woman sees herself eating, then she goes to visit her deceased father. This means that she will soon achieve her dream and ambition. It is also believed that this married woman is good, her friends love her, and she has a good reputation.
